# finbif

[![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/5fdd166e-0155-4992-9009-82434fefe4f4/deploy-status)](https://app.netlify.com/sites/finbif/deploys)

## Installation

You can install the development version of finbif from [Bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org) with:

``` r
remotes::install_bitbucket("luomus/finbif")
```

## Documentation

Read the online documentation [here](https://finbif.netlify.com).
